message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer but $15,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $11,000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I need to prioritize my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
Alice, I'm still interested in the product but $13,000 is pushing my limit. I can offer you $12,500, which is a fair price considering my budget and your valuation. Let's see if we can agree on this.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go down to $12,500 just yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $13,250. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my own valuation.
